title: Great 1 bed, 1 bath and your own private washer/dryer! Visit today!
posting_body: ['Tara Bridge Apartments', '1 Magnolia Circle', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'A wonderful home in Jonesboro is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for Please call  .', 'This unit comes with 650 sq ft.', 'Tara Bridge Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy a game of tennis on the tennis court.', 'A spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking is available.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled amongst canopies of trees and other natural surroundings.', 'This home features uniquely angled walls in every room and an open, airy design.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '−
